description:
Displays icons of running applications on the top panel. Activate, minimize or close tasks with a simple click.
TaskBar is a dock-like windows list on the top bar.

Options:
Desktop button - toggle desktop view
Workspace button - switch workspaces (left/right-click: cycle forward/backward)
Show applications button - leftclick: toggle appview / rightclick: toggle overview
Hide default application menu
Align TaskBar position on the top panel
Thumbnail/label-preview
